allow: Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "WebRTC voice/video calling system" -p 0 --description "Implement peer-to-peer voice and video calling using WebRTC with Nostr for signaling. Exchange SDP offers/answers and ICE candidates through Nostr events.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Nostr signaling for WebRTC" -p 1 --description "Create custom Nostr event kinds for WebRTC signaling: SDP offer/answer exchange, ICE candidate sharing. Use p-tags for targeted peer communication.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "WebRTC peer connection manager" -p 1 --description "Build RTCPeerConnection wrapper for managing audio/video streams, handling connection state, and media device access.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Voice/video call UI components" -p 1 --description "Add call controls UI: mute/unmute, video on/off, end call. Display remote video stream and local preview.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Improve relay connection resilience" -p 2 --description "Add better reconnection logic, relay health monitoring, and fallback relay support. Consider adding relay discovery.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "NIP-07 browser extension wallet support" -p 2 --description "Add support for NIP-07 compatible browser extensions (nos2x, Alby) to use existing Nostr identities instead of generating new keys.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Message encryption with NIP-04" -p 2 --description "Implement NIP-04 encrypted direct messages for private chats. Use shared secret from ECDH for AES encryption.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Fix onboarding flow: key-first instead of display name" -p 0 --description "Change setup screen to ask for Nostr public key OR generate new keypair. Display name should be secondary/optional. Support importing existing keys.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Auto-join channels and show badge notifications" -p 0 --description "Auto-join channel when browsing (passive listening). Show badge on extension icon with unread message count. Remove confusing Join button - just be in the channel automatically.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Global activity view - see users across all URLs" -p 1 --description "Subscribe to all presence events globally (not just current channel). Show a view of which URLs have active users. Enables discovery of where people are chatting.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Fix BIP340 Schnorr signature implementation" -p 0 --description "Fixed Nostr event signature verification failures. Implemented proper BIP340 tagged hashes (BIP0340/aux, BIP0340/nonce, BIP0340/challenge), handle private key negation when public key y-coordinate is odd.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Fix null publicKey crash on popup load" -p 0 --description "Fixed TypeError in announcePresence when publicKey was null. Added null check and fixed initClient to not return uninitialized client.")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Replace expired relay.nostr.band certificate" -p 0 --description "Replaced relay.nostr.band (SSL cert expired causing ERR_CERT_DATE_INVALID) with relay.primal.net")

Bash("C:\Users\grant\bin\bd.exe" create "Add encrypted DMs using NIP-04" -p 1 --description "Enable private direct messages between users using NIP-04 encrypted DMs. Click on a user in the presence list to start a DM conversation. Uses ECDH shared secret with AES-256-CBC encryption.")
